placeholderNoteOrder: Write here to personalize your order...
checkoutWarn: You can't checkout while your cart is empty
addressInfoPlaceholder: Please write your address with nearest landmark
deliveryNotesPlaceholder: Please write your notes for the delivery agent
cartNotice: In case the sweets or baked goods are damaged during delivery, the product will be replaced by contacting us through social media or calling us and providing us with the order number.
emptyCartMsg: Sorry, your cart is empty. You can start selecting products and adding them to your cart to proceed with the checkout.
noFavouritesMessage: Sorry, no favourites here. You can start selecting products and adding them to your favourites by hitting
noOrdersMessage: You currently don't have any active orders. Once you place an order, it will appear here.
successOrderNote: Our team will contact you as soon as possible.
confirmClearCartMessage: Are you sure you want to clear your cart? This action will remove all items currently in your cart and cannot be undone. If you have items you wish to purchase, please review them before proceeding.
confirmRemoveItemFromCartMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your shopping cart? This action cannot be undone once removed. Please make sure to review your cart before proceeding if there are other items you wish to keep.
